creator: rene.hietkamp@planet.nl
text:
Deploying Lenya on jBoss/jetty results in an exception:

Caused by: javax.servlet.ServletException
	at org.apache.lenya.cms.scheduler.LoadQuartzServlet.init

The exception is caused by a missing slash in the next line of restoreJobs()
    File publicationsDirectory = new File(getServletContextPath() +
                PublishingEnvironment.PUBLICATION_PREFIX);

It should be
    File publicationsDirectory = new File(getServletContextPath() + "/" +
                PublishingEnvironment.PUBLICATION_PREFIX);

In PublishingEnvironment more paths are defined. I didn't research if they 
also result in an error due to missing slashes.

See also bugnr: 20972
